name: Whitefall
description:
Whitefall is a VR narrative exploration survival game set in the frozen alien planet Anyu. Play as Eira Aqua, a young scientist. Explore and discover the history and secrets of this planet while trying to survive the extreme cold.

Explore. You are sent on mission to find out what happened to once green planet Anyu.
Survive. Be careful! These are very extreme weather conditions. Monitor your body temperature and look for heat spots.
